item.description:
FASHION & FANTASY
Join us for an evening that puts a spin on Victorian fashion and entertainment in celebration of The Upholstered Woman, currently on view in the museum's Goodwin Parlor.

FASHION FORWARD OR FAUX PAS?
Find out what your future holds with a free tarot card or palm reading

GO GLAM
The Glamour Girls entertain with classic hits and costume changes to match

BEST DRESSED?
Wear your most fabulous outfit for a chance to win prizes and join our fashion parade

SLIP INTO FANTASY
Receive a free tasting of Absinthe, while supplies last

FILM 8 PM
Be amazed by the fantastical set designs and costumes in Tim Burtonâ€™s 2010 adaptation of Alice in Wonderland, starring Johnny Depp, rated PG.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: Phoenix After Hours-Movie "Alice in Wonderland"
